plot: God challenges a Girl to checkers. If she wins then life, as we know it, stays the same. If she loses, then God will start what the Bibles describes as Revelations.
title: The Last Day of Heaven
plot_es: God challenges a Girl to checkers. If she wins then life, as we know it, stays the same. If she loses, then God will start what the Bibles describes as Revelations.
plot_en: God challenges a Girl to checkers. If she wins then life, as we know it, stays the same. If she loses, then God will start what the Bibles describes as Revelations.
